sentences.sContent: I was overwhelmed with excitement, and became acutely aware of my own tachycardia and diaphoresis.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was overwhelmed with excitement, and became acutely aware of my own tachycardia and diaphoresis.
sentences.sCn: 我当时兴奋极了，并且敏锐地发现自己出现了心动过速与发汗。

sentences.sContent: Pheochromocytomas usually present with hypertension and the symptom triad of headaches, diaphoresis and palpitations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pheochromocytomas usually present with hypertension and the symptom triad of headaches, diaphoresis and palpitations.
sentences.sCn: 典型的嗜铬细胞瘤个案之临床表现通常是血压升高、头痛、冒汗及心跳过速。
